https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jxdOoBf6L0bfNUMl6TuGOjZz4xN.jpg The film is about the childhood of Lord Ganesh. The film covers a) Lord Ganesh's birth and b) The story behind Lord Ganesh's voracious appetite which recalls the incident of Lord Kubera inviting Lord Shiva and Goddess Parvathi for a feast and the consequential events Bal Ganesh
